description:
Despite being a reliable and sincere person, the unnamed protagonist has yet to respond to http://anidb.net/ch9748 [Tama] whether he loves her or just considers her a friend. Nevertheless he takes his nightmares seriously and intends to protect her with all he can do. But when dream and reality begin to merge and he wonders whether he is going insane he develops a determination to find out the truth regardless of the consequences, and finding the http://anidb.net/ch9747 [mysterious girl] he saw on the train platform becomes the most important thing for him.
In the game version of Interlude the protagonist is named Aizawa Naoya (相沢 尚也); in the anime version he is kept nameless so that his family relations remain a secret until late in the story: http://anidb.net/ch19492 [Fuyuki Ikuo] is his older brother, http://anidb.net/ch19483 [Saegusa Miyako] is his sister-in-law (and Ikuo`s wife). Miyako`s younger sister http://anidb.net/ch19491 [Saegusa Mutsuki] calls him "onii-chan" though they aren`t real siblings.
name: Shujinkou
